title: Map of Ancient Egypt and Nubia - relationship

content.question: Which of the following statements is true of the relationship between Egypt and Nubia?

choices.label: Nubia ruled Egypt for a century.
Egypt and Nubia united to form the Aksumite Empire.
Nubia and Egypt were ruled by Nok Pharaohs for 1,000 years.
Egypt and Nubia were the first African societies to adopt Christianity.

content.answer: Nubia ruled Egypt for a century.

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
